name: DANIEL HE
profile_summary: Results-driven Full-Stack Software Engineer with expertise in **Java 11+**, **Spring Boot**, **Angular 11+**, and **Hibernate/JPA** for developing scalable and efficient applications. Skilled in crafting **REST APIs** and utilizing **JSON** for seamless data interactions. Proficient in **TypeScript**, **RxJS**, and **SCSS** to create dynamic and responsive front-end experiences. Extensive experience with **PostgreSQL** and **Oracle** databases, as well as solid understanding of **SQL** for effective data management. Knowledgeable in version control systems like **Git** and build tools including **Maven**. Adept at applying object-oriented programming principles, **SOLID** design principles, and design patterns to enhance code maintainability. Proven track record of deploying complex solutions in the healthcare, eCommerce, and finance sectors, showcasing a commitment to clean, reliable, and user-centric software development.

experience.responsibilities:
Utilized **Java 11+** and **Spring Boot** to develop a microservices-based Clinical Patient Management System (CPMS), achieving **95%** accuracy in patient tracking.
Implemented **REST APIs** with **Hibernate/JPA**, enhancing data accuracy by **40%** and ensuring secure EHR integration with **Spring Security** and OAuth2.
Developed and maintained dynamic front-end applications using **Angular 11+** and **TypeScript**, optimizing user interaction and reducing completion time by **30%**.
Improved UI/UX with **SCSS** and design patterns, ensuring a seamless experience for users throughout the application lifecycle.
Created real-time communication features with **JSON** and **RxJS**, significantly boosting operational efficiency.
Conducted database management utilizing **PostgreSQL** and **Oracle**, ensuring data integrity and performance optimization.
Implemented CI/CD practices using **Git** and **Maven**, leading to an **80%** reduction in deployment times.
Adopted object-oriented programming principles and SOLID design patterns across all development activities to ensure maintainable and scalable codebases.

Utilized **Java 11+**, **Spring Boot**, and **Hibernate/JPA** to develop robust backend services, enhancing system performance and reducing response times for ticketing and customer support by **25%**.
Implemented **REST API** services while adhering to **object-oriented programming principles** and **SOLID design patterns** for maintainable and efficient code structure.
Constructed dynamic user interfaces using **Angular 11+** and **TypeScript**, leading to improved interactivity and user experience.
Integrated **PostgreSQL** and **Oracle** databases for robust data management, achieving a **20%** increase in resolution rates through effective data insights.
Employed **Git** and **Maven** for version control and project management, ensuring a seamless development workflow.
Automated testing and deployment pipelines using **Jenkins** and **AWS CodePipeline**, which streamlined our development process and reduced deployment time.
Utilized **Docker** and **Terraform** for infrastructure as code, successfully decreasing the infrastructure setup time by **50%**.

• Developed backend REST APIs using **Java 11+**, **Spring Boot**, **Hibernate/JPA**, and **PostgreSQL**, achieving **98%** uptime.
• Implemented the frontend with **Angular 11+**, improving load times by **40%**.
• Demonstrated proficiency in **JSON**, **TypeScript**, and **RxJS** to enhance application performance.
• Led testing initiatives with **JUnit** and **Mockito**, ultimately reducing bugs by **30%**.
• Optimized frontend performance through techniques like lazy loading and code splitting, resulting in faster load times.
• Utilized **Git** and **Maven** for version control and dependency management in the project.
• Deployed solutions globally with **AWS CloudFront** and **S3** for low-latency access, ensuring robust delivery.

skills:
**Programming Languages**
	Java, Java 11+, JavaScript (React, Vue.js, Angular, Pixi.js, Vanilla JS, Node.js, TypeScript, RxJS), Go, Python, SQL, Swift, Kotlin

**Backend Frameworks**
	Spring Boot, Hibernate, JPA, Spring Security, Node.js, Express.js, Kafka, RabbitMQ

**Frontend Frameworks**
	Angular 11+, React, Vue.js, Pixi.js, Redux, Next.js, React Router, Material-UI, Ant Design, D3.js, Webpack, Babel, Jest, SCSS

**API Technologies**
	REST API, JSON

**Databases**
	PostgreSQL, MySQL, Redis, MongoDB, Oracle

**DevOps**
	Docker, Kubernetes (AWS EKS), Jenkins, GitHub Actions, Terraform, AWS CodePipeline, Git, Maven

**Cloud & Infrastructure**
	AWS (EKS, RDS, CloudFront, S3, Lambda), API Gateway, CloudWatch, ELK Stack

**Other**
	Microservices, object-oriented programming principles, SOLID, design patterns, Data structures and algorithms, CI/CD, Infrastructure as Code (IaC), Agile/Scrum methodologies
